Package com.sanyavertolet.interview.data.dependencies

Class TopologicallySortedDependencyGraph

java.lang.Object
com.sanyavertolet.interview.data.dependencies.TopologicallySortedDependencyGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
DependencyGraph
public class TopologicallySortedDependencyGraph extends Object implements DependencyGraph
Implementation of the DependencyGraph interface that manages dependencies between CellReference instances using a topological sorting approach. This implementation ensures that updates are processed in a dependency-consistent order and detects cyclic dependencies.

  • Method Details

    • addDependency

      public void addDependency(CellReference before, CellReference after) throws DataSelfReferenceException
      Adds a dependency between two CellReference instances, ensuring that the cell identified by before must be processed before the cell identified by after. Throws an exception if a cell is found to depend on itself.
      Specified by:
      addDependency in interface DependencyGraph
      Parameters:
      before - the reference to the cell that must be processed first.
      after - the reference to the cell that depends on before.
      Throws:
      DataSelfReferenceException - if before and after refer to the same cell, creating a self-dependency.

    • clearDependencies

      public void clearDependencies(CellReference reference)
      Clears all dependencies for the specified CellReference. This removes the cell from any dependency chains.
      Specified by:
      clearDependencies in interface DependencyGraph
      Parameters:
      reference - the reference to the cell whose dependencies should be cleared.

    • clearAll

      public void clearAll()
      Clears all dependencies and resets the entire dependency graph, including any recorded failed cells.
      Specified by:
      clearAll in interface DependencyGraph

    • getUpdateList

      public List<CellReference> getUpdateList(CellReference reference) throws DataDependencyException
      Retrieves a list of CellReference instances that need to be updated when the specified cell is modified, sorted in topological order. If a cyclic dependency is detected, an exception is thrown.
      Specified by:
      getUpdateList in interface DependencyGraph
      Parameters:
      reference - the reference to the cell that was modified.
      Returns:
      a list of CellReference instances that should be updated, in topological order.
      Throws:
      DataDependencyException - if a cyclic dependency is detected in the graph.

    • getFailedCellReferences

      public Set<CellReference> getFailedCellReferences()
      Retrieves a set of CellReference instances that have failed due to dependency issues, such as cycles.
      Specified by:
      getFailedCellReferences in interface DependencyGraph
      Returns:
      a set of CellReference instances that have failed.

    • clearFailedCellReferences

      public void clearFailedCellReferences()
      Clears a set of CellReference instances that have failed due tp dependency issues, such as cycles.
      Specified by:
      clearFailedCellReferences in interface DependencyGraph
